detectors.description:
LPTokenWrapper.withdraw(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#632-639) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-amount = underlyingAmount.mul(yycrv.totalSupply()).div(yycrv.balance()) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#636)
	-amount = amount.mul(995).div(1000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#637)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Rewards.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#732-735):

	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#733)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#555)
		- yycrv.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#638)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#734)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#555)
		- gg.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#741)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#734)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#684)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#734)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#683)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#734)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#740)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#686)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#734)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Rewards.sol#687)
